abstract.t: HTTP proxies can operate several different kinds of access services. This specification provides a format for identifying a collection of such services. About This Document This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Status information for this document may be found at https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-schwartz-masque-access- descriptions/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/bemasc/access-services.
